recipes.recipe_info: A classic Italian pasta dish with a meaty tomato sauce.
cooking_method: Cook the spaghetti according to package directions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and cook until softened and fragrant, about 5 minutes.
Add the ground beef to the skillet and cook until browned, breaking up any clumps with a spoon.
Stir in the diced tomatoes, tomato paste, basil, oregano, red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper. Bring to a simmer and let cook for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve the spaghetti topped with the Bolognese sauce and freshly grated Parmesan cheese. Enjoy!

recipes.recipe_info: A creamy and flavorful Indian curry dish with tender chicken.
ingredients: 1 lb (450 g) boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces
1/2 cup (120 g) plain yogurt & 1/4 cup (60 ml) heavy cream
2 tbsp (30 g) butter & 1 tbsp (15 ml) vegetable oil
1 onion, finely chopped, 2 cloves garlic, minced & 1 tbsp (7 g) garam masala
1 tsp (5 g) each of ground turmeric, cumin, and paprika
1/2 tsp (2.5 g) cayenne pepper & Salt and pepper, to taste
Fresh cilantro leaves, chopped, for garnish
cooking_method: Marinate chicken in yogurt, cream, and half of the spices for at least 30 mins.
Sauté onion, garlic, and remaining spices in butter and oil.
Add chicken to the skillet and cook until browned on all sides.
Pour in any remaining marinade, along with 1 cup (240 ml) of water.
Let it simmer until chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened, about 20 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve over cooked basmati rice, garnished with cilantro. Enjoy!

recipes.recipe_info: A hearty Russian dish with tender beef, mushrooms, and sour cream.
ingredients: 1 lb (450 g) beef sirloin, cut into thin strips
2 tbsp (30 g) butter & 1 onion, finely chopped
cooking_method: Brown beef strips in butter, then remove from skillet.
Sauté onion and garlic, then add mushrooms and cook.
Whisk beef broth, sour cream, and Worcestershire sauce together in skillet.
Add beef back in and simmer until sauce thickens and beef is cooked.
Serve over cooked egg noodles and garnish with parsley. Enjoy!

recipes.recipe_info: A delicious and healthy stuffed chicken breast recipe with spinach and feta cheese.
cooking_method: Mix feta cheese and spinach.
Butterfly chicken breasts and stuff with mixture, secure with toothpicks.
Brown chicken in olive oil in a skillet.
Bake in oven until cooked through.
Remove toothpicks and serve hot. Enjoy!

recipes.recipe_info: A classic and irresistible dessert with soft and chewy chocolate chip cookies.
cooking_method: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Cream butter and sugar, add eggs and vanilla.
Gradually stir in dry ingredients.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto baking sheet.
Bake until lightly golden brown.
Cool on baking sheet for 5 mins, then transfer to wire rack to cool completely. Enjoy!

recipes.recipe_info: A creamy and savory Italian rice dish with mushrooms and parmesan cheese.
cooking_method: Simmer broth in a saucepan.
Cook onion and mushrooms in a pot.
Add Arborio rice and coat with oil.
Add wine and broth, stirring until absorbed.
Repeat until rice is tender and creamy.
Remove from heat and stir in cheese and butter.
Season with salt and pepper. Enjoy!

recipes.recipe_info: A simple and flavorful pasta dish with homemade basil pesto.
ingredients: 1/4 cup (60 ml) reserved pasta cooking water
Salt and black pepper, to taste
cooking_method: Cook pasta and reserve 1/4 cup of the cooking water.
Heat heavy cream in a skillet.
Add Parmesan cheese and whisk until melted.
Add pesto sauce and whisk until well combined.
Add reserved cooking water and whisk until desired consistency.
Season with salt and pepper.
Add pasta to skillet and toss until coated.
Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.recipe_info: A quick and easy Chinese-inspired stir fry with tender beef and broccoli.
cooking_method: In a small bowl, whisk together cornstarch and soy sauce.
Cut beef into thin strips and coat with cornstarch mixture.
In a wok or large skillet, heat sesame oil over high heat.
Add beef and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until browned.
Add broccoli and red pepper flakes and stir-fry for an additional 2-3 minutes until broccoli is tender-crisp.
Serve hot with rice and enjoy!

recipes.recipe_info: A hearty and healthy chili recipe packed with beans, vegetables, and spices.
cooking_method: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add onion, garlic and bell pepper and sauté until softened.
Add chili powder and cumin and stir for about 1 minute.
Add diced tomatoes, kidney beans and corn.
Add enough water to cover the vegetables and beans.
Bring to a boil and then reduce heat and simmer for about 20-25 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot and enjoy!

recipes.recipe_info: A delicious and easy-to-make seafood dish with tangy lemon and garlic flavors.
cooking_method: Heat butter in a skillet over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and sauté for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook for 2-3 minutes until pink.
Add lemon juice and parsley, and stir to combine.
Serve hot with rice or salad, and enjoy!

recipes.recipe_info: A classic Italian casserole dish with ziti pasta, meaty tomato sauce, and melted cheese.
cooking_method: Cook ziti pasta and drain.
Mix together ricotta, mozzarella, and parmesan cheese.
Combine cooked pasta with cheese mixture.
Layer tomato sauce on the bottom of a baking dish.
Add ziti mixture to the baking dish and spread evenly.
Top with additional tomato sauce.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 20 minutes covered, and 10-15 minutes uncovered.
Let cool, serve and enjoy!

recipes.recipe_info: A moist and delicious homemade bread recipe made with ripe bananas and warm spices.
cooking_method: Mash bananas and mix with butter and brown sugar.
In a separate bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and salt.
Combine the two mixtures until just combined.
Pour batter into a greased loaf pan and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 50-60 minutes.
Let cool, slice, and serve your delicious banana bread!

recipes.recipe_info: A popular Indian dish made with marinated chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce.
ingredients: 1 lb (450 g) boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces
1/2 cup (120 g) plain yogurt & 1/4 cup (60 ml) heavy cream
2 tbsp (30 g) butter & 1 tbsp (15 ml) vegetable oil
1 onion, finely chopped, 2 cloves garlic, minced & 1 tbsp (7 g) garam masala
1 tsp (5 g) each of ground turmeric, cumin, and paprika
1/2 tsp (2.5 g) cayenne pepper & Salt and pepper, to taste
Fresh cilantro leaves, chopped, for garnish
cooking_method: Marinate chicken in yogurt, cream, and half of the spices for at least 30 mins.
Sauté onion, garlic, and remaining spices in butter and oil.
Add chicken to the skillet and cook until browned on all sides.
Pour in any remaining marinade, along with 1 cup (240 ml) of water.
Let it simmer until chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened, about 20 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve over cooked basmati rice, garnished with cilantro. Enjoy!

recipes.recipe_name: Spinach and Feta Stuffed Chicken Breast
recipes.recipe_info: A healthy and flavorful chicken dish stuffed with spinach, feta cheese, and herbs.
ingredients: Toothpicks or kitchen twine, for securing chicken
cooking_method: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cook garlic and spinach in olive oil until wilted.
Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper.
Stuff chicken breasts with feta cheese and spinach mixture.
Bake for 25-30 minutes until chicken is cooked through.
Let chicken rest for 5 minutes before serving.

recipes.recipe_info: An easy and delicious side dish of crispy roasted potatoes seasoned with garlic and herbs.
ingredients: 2 lbs small potatoes, washed and dried
cooking_method: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
Cut the potatoes into halves or quarters, depending on their size.
In a large bowl, toss the potatoes with minced garlic, olive oil, dried thyme, salt, and pepper until well coated.
Arrange the potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Roast in the oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender and golden brown, stirring once halfway through.
Remove from the oven and let cool for a few minutes before serving.

recipes.recipe_info: A classic homemade pizza recipe with your choice of toppings and a crispy crust.
ingredients: Toppings of your choice (e.g. pepperoni, sliced vegetables, cooked sausage, etc.)
cooking_method: Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C).
Roll out pizza dough and transfer it to a pizza pan.
Spread pizza sauce over the dough and top with shredded mozzarella cheese and toppings of your choice.
Bake in the oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
Slice the pizza and serve.

recipes.recipe_info: A classic and irresistible dessert with soft and chewy chocolate chip cookies.
cooking_method: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Cream butter and sugar, add eggs and vanilla.
Gradually stir in dry ingredients.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto baking sheet.
Bake until lightly golden brown.
Cool on baking sheet for 5 mins, then transfer to wire rack to cool completely. Enjoy!

recipes.recipe_info: A classic cookie recipe with chocolate chips that are crispy on the outside and chewy on the inside.
cooking_method: Season the beef chuck roast with salt and pepper.
Place the sliced onion, chopped carrots, and minced garlic in the bottom of a slow cooker.
Place the beef chuck roast on top of the vegetables.
Pour the beef broth over the beef and vegetables.
Cover the slow cooker and cook on low for 8-10 hours, or on high for 4-6 hours, until the beef is tender and falls apart easily.
Remove the beef from the slow cooker and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing.
Serve the beef with the vegetables and broth.

recipes.recipe_info: A hearty and comforting dish made with beef strips, mushrooms, and a creamy sauce served over noodles.
ingredients: 1 lb (450 g) beef sirloin, cut into thin strips
2 tbsp (30 g) butter & 1 onion, finely chopped
cooking_method: Brown beef strips in butter, then remove from skillet.
Sauté onion and garlic, then add mushrooms and cook.
Whisk beef broth, sour cream, and Worcestershire sauce together in skillet.
Add beef back in and simmer until sauce thickens and beef is cooked.
Serve over cooked egg noodles and garnish with parsley. Enjoy!

recipes.recipe_info: A healthy and colorful stir-fry with a variety of vegetables, served over rice or noodles.
ingredients: 2 cups chopped vegetables (e.g. broccoli, bell peppers, carrots, mushrooms, etc.)
cooking_method: Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over high heat.
Add the chopped onion and minced garlic to the skillet and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Add the chopped vegetables to the skillet and stir-fry for 4-5 minutes until tender-crisp.
Add the soy sauce and season with salt and pepper to taste.
Stir-fry for an additional 1-2 minutes until the vegetables are coated with the sauce.
Remove the skillet from the heat and serve the vegetable stir-fry hot.

recipes.recipe_info: A classic Italian dish made with breaded chicken cutlets, tomato sauce, and melted mozzarella cheese.
cooking_method: Season chicken with salt and pepper, dredge in flour, dip in beaten eggs, and coat with breadcrumbs.
Place chicken in a greased baking dish, top with marinara sauce and shredded mozzarella cheese.
Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 20-25 minutes, or until chicken is cooked and cheese is melted and bubbly.
Let cool for a few minutes before serving.

recipes.recipe_info: A comforting and flavorful soup made with ripe tomatoes, cream, and herbs.
cooking_method: Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add the chopped onion and minced garlic to the pot and sauté for 3-4 minutes until softened.
Add the canned crushed tomatoes and vegetable broth to the pot and stir to combine.
Bring the soup to a simmer and let it cook for 10-15 minutes.
Use an immersion blender or transfer the soup to a blender and puree until smooth.
Season the soup with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve the tomato soup hot.

recipes.recipe_info: A classic and irresistible dessert with soft and chewy chocolate chip cookies.
cooking_method: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Cream butter and sugar, add eggs and vanilla.
Gradually stir in dry ingredients.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto baking sheet.
Bake until lightly golden brown.
Cool on baking sheet for 5 mins, then transfer to wire rack to cool completely. Enjoy!

cooking_method: Mash bananas and mix with butter and brown sugar.
In a separate bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and salt.

Sauté onion and garlic, then add mushrooms and cook.
